page.title: 12Work in a Glasshouse.
page.content: In Winter we grow a lot of lettuce and a few tomatoes. Cucumbers and tomatoes need a lot of sun and hot weather so the Summer is the best time to grow them. In Winter we start to grow small cucumbers and tomato plants ready for planting in the glasshouses. At this glasshouse my job is to pick tomatoes then put them in a large green machine which sorts them into different sizes. I then put them into boxes ready to be sent to the shops. Summertime is the worst time of the year to be working under glass. It gets very hot and stuffy. We work long hours, 7.30am to 8pm. We even work on Saturday morning. I wear rubber gloves when picking tomatoes or my hands turn a funny green."
